item.title: Project-AudioBook
item.description: Project AudioBook is non-profit organization, run by the students who are very passionate to cater back to the society. We believe Anyone can achieve so many things by just learning from the books, novels. But many times big books and lengthy novels are very hectic and time-consuming to read. So we thought to create a open platform Project-AudioBook.

We strongly believe that Anyone can achieve so many things by just learning from the books, novels. But many times big books and lengthy novels are very hectic and time-consuming to read.
